channel.title: Toddville on The Compass Rose Band
channel.description: Recent content in Toddville on The Compass Rose Band

item.title: Laurieloo and Doug's 60th Birthday Bash
item.description: Come out and help Laurieloo & Doug celebrate their 60th birthdays. $10 cover

item.title: JR and Laurieloo's Party on the Patio
item.description: We had so much fun at this year's Party on the Patio that we decided to make it an annual event. A $10 donation would be appreciated to help cover the cost of the band. Bring your lawn chairs, coolers and a snack to share for the potluck. Spread the word and let's make this Party on the Patio even better than 2017!
